name: product_type
description: Type of product involved in the incident.

name: original_battery
description: Whether the battery was the original battery for the product.

name: installation_status
description: Whether the battery was permanently installed.

name: safety_listed
description: Whether the battery was listed by an independent testing company, such as UL or Intertek.

name: vehicle_battery
description: Whether the battery was an electric vehicle battery.

name: charging_at_ignition
description: Whether the battery was charging at the time of ignition.

name: incident_indoor_outdoor
description: Location of the battery at the time of ignition - Indoors or Outdoors.

name: in_direct_sunlight
description: Whether the battery was exposed to direct sunlight at the time of ignition.

name: primary_indoor_outdoor
description: Primary storage location of the battery when not in use - Indoors or Outdoors.

name: impacted_from_source
description: Whether the battery was impacted due to the ignition of another source.

name: thermal_runaway
description: Whether the battery displayed signs of thermal runaway.

name: fd_suppression
description: Type of suppression/mitigation efforts employed by the fire department to suppress the battery fire.

name: battery_cell
description: Type of cell of the batter.

name: battery_size_voltage
description: Unit of measure which represents the difference in electrical potential

name: battery_size_amp_hour
description: Unit of measure for a battery's energy capacity

name: battery_size_watt_hour
description: Unit of measurement for energy that quantifies the amount of power (watts) used over time.

name: battery_charge
description: Unit of measure of the state of charge percentage of the battery
